name: Land of Calgwin: Origin-A
description:
You play as Adiba, a military Sergeant of the 24th Legion, where you are living a monotonous life in a neverending war between regional territories in Calgwin who are aiming to conquer the world. You are just a pawn in this chess game of world domination.

But suddenly, your world turns upside down when you touch a glowing pendant rewind time to go back to the past, where magic rules the world of Calgwin!
